Class LookupPolicy<S,A extends Action>

java.lang.Object
  aima.core.probability.mdp.impl.LookupPolicy<S,A>
Type Parameters:
S - the state type.
A - the action type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Policy<S,A>
public class LookupPolicy<S,A extends Action>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Policy<S,A>

Default implementation of the Policy interface using an underlying Map to look up an action associated with a state.

Author:
Ciaran O'Reilly
